description: Detects specific process characteristics of Maze ransomware word document droppers Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Maze Ransomware
query: ((process.parent.executable:*\\WINWORD.exe AND process.executable:*.tmp) OR (process.executable:*\\wmic.exe AND process.parent.executable:*\\Temp\\* AND process.command_line:*shadowcopy\ delete) OR (process.command_line:*shadowcopy\ delete AND process.command_line:*\\..\\..\\system32*))
